paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the TTR gene with penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.phenotype_details: ATTR amyloidosis based on Val30Met mutation
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Example of a 70 year old female patient with ATTR amyloidosis based on Val30Met mutation.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with ATTR amyloidosis.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: This variant is commonly associated with hereditary amyloidosis.
key_quotes: Example of a 70 year old female patient with ATTR amyloidosis based on Val30Met mutation.

individual_records.phenotype_details: hereditary ATTR amyloidosis (TTR-Tyr114Cys), without cardiac bone tracer accumulation.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Example of a 42 year old female patients with hereditary ATTR amyloidosis (TTR-Tyr114Cys), without cardiac bone tracer accumulation.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with hereditary ATTR amyloidosis.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: This variant is linked to hereditary forms of amyloidosis.
key_quotes: Example of a 42 year old female patients with hereditary ATTR amyloidosis (TTR-Tyr114Cys), without cardiac bone tracer accumulation.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Patient A: late HMR 1.57, wash-out >20%, patient B: late HMR 1.13, wash-out 28%.
Patient A: late HMR 1.57, wash-out >20%, patient B: late HMR 1.13, wash-out 28%.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with both wtATTR and hATTR.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: This variant is associated with both wild-type and hereditary forms of amyloidosis.
key_quotes: Patient A: late HMR 1.57, wash-out >20%, patient B: late HMR 1.13, wash-out 28%.

tables_processed.table_caption: Main results and patient outcome as reported in studies using Iodine-123 labelled metaiodobenzylguanidine scintigraphy in patients with amyloidosis

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant TTR variants were extracted with detailed penetrance data.
